entry.title: $2000 // 1BR/1BTHRM APT LEASE TAKE OVER
entry.content:
I have a beautiful 1 BR/1BTHRM apartment in Park Slope South. I'm looking for someone to take my lease over March 1, 2019 through September 2019 with the option to renew for a year or 2 year lease. Features hardwood floors, original detail, and high ceilings. Located on a beautiful tree-lined block steps from Methodist Hospital, Barnes and Nobles and much more! 2 short blocks from the F and G trains.

The bedroom fits a queens size bed comfortably with a cozy living room and kitchen combo. The apartment is around the corner from great restaurants bakeries, cafe and wine shops. Laundry and the dry cleaners are on the corner. Down the block from Prospect Park, close to Grand Army Plaza, and the farmers market in Windsor Terrance.

Heat and Hot water are included in the rent. Please contact me via email if you are interested in coming to look at it.
